summary: The FDA oversees the safety of about 80% of the nation’s food supply and promotes good nutrition. According to the FDA, a 2011 law shifted the agency's focus from responding to illnesses to preventing food contamination. We examined actions the FDA has taken since then on food safety, which is a topic on our high risk list , and nutrition. Among other things, we found...
title: Food Safety and Nutrition: FDA Can Build on Existing Efforts to Measure Progress and Implement Key Activities
